## Exploratory Data Viz

\# view(penguins) in console to pull up penguin data set

Check out your data:

```{r}
#| include: false

# Tell me the column names
names(penguins)

# What are the dimensions>
dim(penguins)

#Can you show me the first 6 times?
head(penguins)

#Can you show me the last 6 lines?
tail(penguins)
```
